summary: Frontend testing of EaziWage redesigned marketing pages completed. All 11 marketing pages render correctly with modern African-fintech aesthetic. Theme toggle (dark/light mode) works perfectly. Navigation links functional.

console_errors.issue: React hydration warning: Invalid HTML nesting - span inside tbody. The comparisons table mapping creates a span wrapper around tr elements.
console_errors.impact: Does not affect visual rendering or functionality

passed_tests: Landing page (/) renders with hero, stats, features, testimonials, countries section
About page (/about) renders with company story, stats (50K+, KES 2B+), values, timeline, team section
Pricing page (/pricing) renders with 3 pricing tiers (Starter, Business, Enterprise)
Contact page (/contact) renders with contact form and 4 office locations (Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Rwanda)
FAQ page (/faq) renders with searchable FAQ categories (General, Employees, Employers, Fees, Security, Technical)
Partners page (/partners) renders with partner types (Employers, Payroll Providers, Financial Institutions, HR Consultants) and integration steps
Blog page (/blog) renders with articles, featured post, and categories
How It Works page (/how-it-works) renders with 4-step guide
For Employers page (/employers) renders with benefits, features, and process
Privacy Policy page (/privacy) renders with legal content sections and TOC sidebar
Terms of Service page (/terms) renders with legal content sections and TOC sidebar
Theme toggle (data-testid='theme-toggle') switches between dark and light mode correctly
Navigation links (Home, How it Works, For Employers, Pricing, About, Contact) work correctly
Footer renders with proper branding, links, and contact info
Green theme consistent across all pages
action_items: LOW PRIORITY: Fix HTML structure in PricingPage.jsx line 298-300 - wrap comparisons.map() output directly without extra span wrapper to avoid hydration warning
critical_code_review_comments: PricingPage.jsx: Table comparison section has invalid HTML nesting (span as child of tbody). Should use React.Fragment or direct tr mapping instead of span wrapper.

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all 11 marketing pages render correctly, theme toggle works, navigation functional)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All marketing pages redesigned with rich African-fintech aesthetic. Green theme maintained. Dark/light mode toggle working with data-testid='theme-toggle'. ThemeProvider at /app/frontend/src/lib/ThemeContext.jsx. All pages use MarketingNav component with consistent navigation. Footer component has social links, newsletter subscription, and country coverage info.
rca_of_the_issue: Minor hydration warning caused by span element wrapping tr elements in table tbody. This is a React dev-mode warning and does not affect production functionality.
